動物用藥品名稱: 維奧雞新城病、傳染性鼻炎不活化混合疫苗
地址: INDUSTRIAL ZONE P.O. BOX 300 OR-AKIVA 30600, ISRAEL
效能(適應症): 預防雞新城病、傳染性鼻炎感染。
ingredients: INACTIVATED NEWCASTLE DISEASE (ND) VIRUS, LA SOTA STRAIN: AT LEAST10^8.5 EID50; INACTIVATED  HEAMPPHILUS PARAGALLINARUM SEROTYPES A,C:EACH SEROTYPE AT LEAST 10^8.0 CFU; SORBITAN MONOOLEATE 22.0 MG;POLYSORBATE 80 5.5 MG; MINERAL OIL 0.375 ML; THIOMERSAL OIL: ATMOST 0.05MG.
